location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 19/7 Tour of Mr Dundas, Educational Council Cairo to Persian Gulf'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers in the file are arranged chronologically. There are notes on folio 10. The notes are arranged chronologically and refer to documents within the file; they give brief description of the correspondence with a number, which refers back to that correspondence in the file.

Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 15; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 2-11; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: The file contains telegrams and correspondence regarding arrangements for Cyril Alfred Flux Dundas, from the British Council in Cairo, visiting Bahrain and Muscat. The correspondence includes a memorandum regarding centres of education not under the British Council's control.
